description:
Bookkeeping knowledge is fundamental to the success of any finance career. This course equips candidates with the essential steps in bookkeeping.

Bookkeeping made simple abolishes all the complex accountancy language and breaks bookkeeping into easy steps. Students will go from no knowledge to a full understanding of bookkeeping and accounting within a hour! Watch the lecturer doing on screen examples in this interactive course. The free interactive workbook Is a great revision bonus.

Quotes from students who attended the course:

"I was struggling with accountancy exams before this course. The lecturer was excellent and the grounding in bookkeeping enabled me to study further concepts with ease and pass my exams"

"The lecturer has broken down a difficult subject into easy to follow steps, I understood and could bookkeep proficiently within an hour!"

This course assumes no knowledge of bookkeeping or accounting and takes students through a simplified step by step journey in bookkeeping.

The learner can watch the lecturer on screen doing examples and numerous interactive exercises are used to consolidate knowledge.

The course encompasses an hour interactive video and a comprehensive workbook.

This course definitely simplifies bookkeeping and has transformed the studies of hundreds of students who are either staring or struggling with bookkeeping or accounting courses.
title: Bookkeeping made simple
